__e: I thought you were one of those men who attacked my uncle.
You know I don't want a war, but they attacked us in our backyard.
Then later, down by the sea they attacked my father, and they killed him.
I can't make out why they only came after me.
They attacked me and my friend the other day...
And then when I came back to apologize for it, 20 years later, they hit me with a TV... a bunch of times.
If they want to throw us out, why didn't they come in force?
No, they attacked me, I do not remember anything else.
Yeah, you two attacked me, and when I tried to talk to you, Mum, you just had a panic attack.
The one you know about, the three that attacked me, - and my partner.
- They must be the same ones who got those soldiers.
That's when the Germans attacked, those sneaky bastards.
What time were the boy and girl attacked last night?
Do you know one of your neighbors was attacked early this morning?
Now that a cop's been targeted, the investigation will get all the support it needs.
The women in his paintings look like they really tuck away the groceries.
